DOC.brief_summary: This study assess impact mindfulness-based stress reduction program compare health education program urban middle-school male youth outcomes psychological symptom , cop , stress , sleep , behavior .
DOC.criteria: 7th 8th grader St. Ignatius Loyola Academy 20092010 academic year .
